summary: Implemented a watch affordance and an on-page modal player for released episodes, with clear messaging for unreleased episodes and for released episodes missing a video URL. Episode view model was extended to carry videoUrl/thumbnailUrl through to the card/player UI. Additionally, unrelated global styling/theme changes were introduced.

hallucinated_features.description: Global visual theme/glow/animation CSS enhancements unrelated to adding episode playback UI.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on EpisodesSection UI behavior and episode view model fields for playback; it does not request broad site-wide theme/glow/animation updates.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes/additions to the static season1Episodes data not required for public playback UI implementation.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-48/REQ-49 are about public Episodes section playback/gating and passing through backend fields; updating static seed episode list is not requested.
